code projects

NLP Centre web page

about

Web pages of Natural Language Processing Centre at Faculty of Informatics Masaryk University were firstly available only as simple wiki pages, but as the number of articles grew, the web page became hard to use, especially for orientation within the content. Therefore, the page undertook a complete redesign.

Firstly, an analysis of different user groups and content was undertaken with the members of the Centre, which resulted in three different personas. Only then, the design and development stage could begin.

The web pages are fully responsive and updated with new content on a regular basis.

available at
